root: ^It has been thirteen years since the day I was born. All those days meld into a singular view—a room steeped in books, weathered furniture, and an ancient dust hanging visibly in the air.
^The only variable in this constant environment is a man. I am acquainted with him, yet I do not truly know him. While he visits my room, he remains distant enough that his scent eludes me.
^He wears but one expression. He is the man who allows me to dwell within his tower. His name is Magnus.
^He gestured with an open palm, a sign of greeting.
^"Congratulations on reaching the ripe age of thirteen. What do you wish for this year?"
^"I must say, one thought always lingers in my mind. I ponder the world beyond these brick walls. Is that world akin to the tales in the books you've bestowed upon me?
^Do philosophers traverse village centers, enlightening the less fortunate with their wisdom? Are temples adorned with fresh flowers and devoted believers?"
^"Do you wish to visit the outside?"
^An uncomfortable silence descended between us. We locked eyes, waiting for one of us to break it. Yet, neither dared to do so for a minute that felt like eternity.
^"If that is your wish, then I hope your journey brings you joy. However, I do have one condition."
^"You need to come back when the sun goes down. You are still a child under my care."
^"I understand. Thank you, Magnus. I will begin my journey once I pack the most important goods."
^"I am going to give you two gifts. I trust they will help you."
^His hands emanated an orange fluorescent fog. It floated to another room, a place of knowlage and began expanding. A small explosion followed, revealing a large rodent.
^A capybara, a semi-aquatic guinea pig known for its social and gentle nature.
^"This is Magibara, a magical familiar that will accompany you on your journey. It shall help with alchemy and be an emotional support."
^"I want you to take this coat with you. It's not magical, yet the outer layer is a necessity"
^He handed me a deep blue coat.
^"Thank you. I will take my leave then."
^"Go back when it gets dark, Freya. I trust you shall not disappoint me."
^"I do have one mission for you."
